description: An interactive web application that visualizes recent earthquake activity across the world using real-time data from the USGS Earthquake API. Built for geography students like Casey to explore seismic patterns visually.

userPersona.name: Casey
userPersona.goal: Understand global seismic activity by visualizing recent earthquakes on a map.

coreFeatures.name: Interactive Map with Earthquake Markers
coreFeatures.description: Map displaying global earthquake locations with color-coded markers by magnitude.

coreFeatures.name: Earthquake Details Popup
coreFeatures.description: Each marker opens a popup showing magnitude, location, depth, and time.

coreFeatures.name: Live Data Fetching
coreFeatures.description: Fetches latest earthquake data from USGS and refreshes periodically.

coreFeatures.name: Magnitude Filter
coreFeatures.description: Material UI slider to filter earthquakes by magnitude range.

coreFeatures.name: List View of Earthquakes
coreFeatures.description: Sidebar or drawer showing a list of recent earthquakes. Clicking zooms to map marker.

coreFeatures.name: Map Marker Styling
coreFeatures.description: Markers sized and colored based on magnitude severity (green <3, yellow 3-5, red >5).

coreFeatures.name: Map Legend
coreFeatures.description: Floating legend explaining marker colors and magnitude severity.

coreFeatures.name: Responsive Design
coreFeatures.description: Fully responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop using Tailwind CSS and Material UI Grid.

coreFeatures.name: Loading and Error States
coreFeatures.description: Material UI CircularProgress for loading and Snackbar for API errors.

coreFeatures.name: Dark Mode Support
coreFeatures.description: Toggle to switch between light and dark themes using Material UI theming.

optionalFeatures.name: Date Range Selector
optionalFeatures.description: Filter earthquakes by past day, week, or month (using alternate USGS endpoints).

optionalFeatures.name: Search by Location
optionalFeatures.description: Search a city or region and center the map on it using geocoding.

optionalFeatures.name: Clustered Markers
optionalFeatures.description: Group nearby earthquakes into clusters to reduce marker clutter.

optionalFeatures.name: Seismic Heatmap
optionalFeatures.description: Overlay a heatmap showing areas with high recent earthquake intensity.

optionalFeatures.name: Download Data as CSV
optionalFeatures.description: Export visible earthquake data to CSV for analysis.

mainLayout.rightPanel: Interactive Leaflet Map with Earthquake Markers and Legend

mobileUX.drawer: Collapsible list view accessible from a button

accessibility.contrastRatios: WCAG AA compliant using Material UI defaults

notes: User authentication is not required. The focus is on providing a clean, educational, and interactive earthquake data visualization tool for students.
